column1: Select Yes to enable modal output.
column2: Select Yes to enable modal output.

column1: Select "Yes" to enable and "No" to disable modal output everywhere.
column2: Select "Yes" to enable and "No" to disable modal output everywhere.

column1: Threshold for pages visited after which the modal should pop up. The number of actual pages visited must be greater than this threshold for the modal to be displayed.
column2: Threshold for pages visited after which the modal should pop up. The number of actual pages visited must be greater than this threshold for the modal to be displayed.
